alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 18 at 3:41AM MDT until June 19 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR DRY THUNDERSTORMS...WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 484 BELOW 6500 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 484 Tavaputs Plateau. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated to widely scattered dry thunderstorms are possible this afternoon and evening. Strong and erratic outflow winds are possible with any storms. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of lightning...strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
